GET.summary: Fetches the name of a Google Drive folder by ID.
GET.description: Brief description of what this API endpoint does: Fetches metadata for courses hosted on Google Drive using the provided folder ID. It uses the `getGoogleDriveApiKey` function to authenticate and make an HTTP GET request to fetch only the name field from a specific course's directory in Google Drive.

GET.summary: Fetch course folder details including metadata and contents.
GET.description: Retrieves the name, modified time of a Google Drive folder specified by Folder ID. Additionally fetches all files within this folder recursively, differentiating between folders (represented as objects with `children` property) and other file types like PDFs or images
